teams.name: Team Reddit!
teams.loan_because: We redditors believe change is something that we should all take responsibility for.
teams.description: A group of people from the social news website reddit - started not by reddit admins, but by redditors themselves.

teams.name: Laurier Microfinance Group
teams.loan_because: Our members want to make an impact on the lives of the needy
teams.description: Laurier Microfinance Group is a part of Wilfrid Laurier Universtiy. Laurier Microfinance Group is there to provide entrepreneurs in developing nations who do not have the resources to fund their ideas by providing them with microfinance loans. As a member of LMG, you will manage a loan portfolio with Kiva. Club members can help raise awareness about poor economic conditions in various nations.The purpose of the club is to create sustainable wealth for entrepreneurs in developing nations

teams.name: Kiva Team Italia - Italy
teams.loan_because:
"Migliorare la vita degli altri migliora anche la tua" ....   .....  ...........
Improving lives of others also improves yours
teams.description:
Una bella fotografia della nostra splendida realtà… Bellissima, variegata, colorata, vivace… unica…. Italiana!!!!

--------------------------------

A beautiful picture of our wonderful reality… Beautiful, varied, colorful, lively.... unique……. Italian!

teams.whereabouts: Monash University, Australia, South Africa and Malaysia

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Morgan Park Academy
teams.loan_because:
"I think therefore I am?" 
We loan because we learn!
teams.description: We are a pre-K through 12 college prep shool in Chicago. We give loans through our Global Council.

teams.name: DO WORK!
teams.loan_because: We do work, and so can you.
teams.description: We're inspired by hard working people around the world and we want to contribute to their success. We our loans will inspire the lendees to pay it forward in the future.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Supporters of Teach for America (Unofficial)
teams.loan_because: we are always looking for new ways to expand the life prospects of the disadvantaged

teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: EffortforOthers
teams.loan_because:
We see micro lending as a vehicle to change the world. We believe in a giving-model that is empowering, respectful and deliberate. We are sure the outcome of such action will have a significantly powerful impact on social, economic and environmental realities.

We recognise that the opportunity we enjoy in Australia isn't something we're entitled to, and we want to share our good fortune with others. 

We loan because it makes us feel good knowing we're making a positive social difference around the world.

We loan because it's an opportunity to start a conversation with our children, friends, co-workers, strangers on the bus and inspire them to the possibilities of what is possible feel how good it is to give.
teams.description:
Our team is YOU! 

We are regular people, doing regular things, but with one special characteristic, we believe in social kindness and the positive power of each other. Through daily association with each other and the projects we believe in, we are an ongoing source and consequence of kindness, inspiration, energy and connection.

teams.name: lacolectivadeconciencias
teams.loan_because: we believe in microfinance!
teams.description: friends and family taking care of each other while helping to create a better world trough conscious action.

teams.name: Simon Fraser University (SFU)
teams.loan_because: We would like to leverage the principles of micro financing offered by Kiva and through the collective efforts of individual loans help support our neighbors around the world.
teams.description: Our team is comprised of students, friends, and family, who would like to make a loan on behalf of Simon Fraser University (SFU), a Canadian University located in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada with campuses throughout the Greater Vancouver Regional District.

teams.name: KIVA AUSSIES
teams.loan_because: We want to empower others for a better life...
teams.description: Love and care for our neighbours.

teams.name: AquaSource
teams.loan_because: We support taking responsibility for one's own health & happiness. We understand we are all inter-dependent. We respect: hard work; those who show initiative and seek to serve and who take action.
teams.description: We are a network marketing company selling natural products, enabling people to run their own business and accelerate their own personal development within a supportive, positive community. We invite distributors to join our team on Kiva!

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Kiva Friends Bavaria / Germany
teams.loan_because: we think that Kiva is a great idea! It is so easy to help other people! Lending is much better than donation!

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.loan_because:

teams.name: Bemidji State University
teams.loan_because: we promote the value of Generosity.
teams.description: As northern Minnesota's university, we engage in new worlds of thought, embrace responsible citizenship, and educate for a future that can only be imagined.

teams.name: Zoar Yarns of Love
teams.loan_because: We want to support other women and share the love of God in a tangible way.
teams.description: We are Christian knitters and crocheters who give away the garments we make to those in need.

teams.name: Zoar Lutherans
teams.loan_because:
Micah 6:8
"He has shown all you people what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God. " 

Kiva is our way of responding to what is required of us.
teams.description: We are an ELCA congregation located in Perrysburg, Ohio

teams.name: Bookcrossing
teams.loan_because: BookCrossers love to share.
teams.description:
We are members of bookcrossing.com who love to share books and also aim to fight poverty by lending on Kiva. Bookcrossing teams can also be found on https://www.lendwithcare.org and http://www.deki.org.uk

You can also join us for a chat on Bookcrossers Fighting Poverty www.facebook.com/groups/181300878717239

teams.name: Kiva @ Redlands
teams.loan_because:
We can help lift entrepreneurs out of poverty, one microloan at a time. 

This not only helps to enrich their lives. But, will teach students, faculty, staff, alumni, and friends of the University of Redlands about socities, economies and commerce in developing areas of the world.
teams.description: Our team is comprised of students, faculty, staff, alumni and friends of the University of Redlands. All of the funds raised by the club are allocated through the member; "Kiva @ Redlands Team." Other funds are donated by individuals themselves.

teams.name: Chair The Wealth
teams.loan_because: We care...
teams.description: A group of Middle School teachers and students...

teams.name: Bemidji State University
teams.loan_because: we promote the value of Generosity.
teams.description: As northern Minnesota's university, we engage in new worlds of thought, embrace responsible citizenship, and educate for a future that can only be imagined.

teams.name: Calgary Pixel Pool Capital
teams.loan_because: We are so incredibly fortunate in Calgary, AB, Canada, a city with a strong entrepreneurial spirit. It only makes sense for Calgarians to foster that spirit everywhere we can. Let's LEND a helping hand Calgary!
teams.description: Digital types - social media aficionados, web developers, pixel pushers, bloggers, Tweetheads, interactive creators and app developers. Basically geeks with a social conscience. Supported by Third Tuesday Calgary (#TTYYC) and Social Media Breakfast Calgary (#SMBYYC)

teams.name: Belgium
teams.loan_because: Its a nice way to help the beneficiaries of the loans create their own business and hopefully improve their lives.
teams.description: Team of the Belgian citizens & residents and of the fans of Belgian Waffles, Chocolate & Beers !

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Ofelia
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a great way to help people attain a good life

teams.name: Friends of Caren Ferreira
teams.loan_because: we want to carry on the work and honor the memory of our friend and co-worker who introduced us to Kiva.
teams.description: We are a group of caregivers and people who care for those in need.

teams.name: Accenture
teams.loan_because: Lending through Kiva aligns with our core values, including building a heritage for future generations, and treating people with dignity and respect.
teams.description: Employees of Accenture LLP.

teams.name: Operation Camango
teams.loan_because: We're getting married and we want to share!
teams.description: Gift-giving band of do-gooders.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: SETI.Germany
teams.description: Germany's biggest Community for Distributed Computing

teams.name: Freemasons
teams.loan_because: Faith, Hope, and Charity are our basic beliefs.
teams.description: Freemasons making a difference in the world.  Members of the world's oldest fraternity putting into practice the charity we discuss in our lodges.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:

http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.loan_because: We believe that students can make a real difference through microfinance lending, and that microfinance simply makes sense.

teams.loan_because: We dig entrepreneurship, metrics and good causes.
teams.description: HubSpot helps businesses transform the way they communicate and connect with their customers and prospects.

teams.name: Black Horses

teams.name: Mars Hill Lending Team
teams.description:
From 2007 to 2012, the Mars Hill community invested $1.2 million dollars to support the efforts of Turame Community Finance in Burundi, Africa. Now we are continuing our involvement with Turame in an even more hands-on-way - by becoming microfinance lenders. 

How to get involved:
1. Click the join team button to the left [if you are new to Kiva you will need to create an account].

2. Choose a Borrower: Check out the current Turame loans by scrolling down at this link: [http://bit.ly/pGU0sd] If there are no new loans, check back in as Turame posts new loans twice a month.

3. Make a Loan:

4. Get Repaid: Over the course of 6 months your loan will get repaid to you in the form of Kiva credit. [This is a loan, not a donation]

5. Repeat.  You can take the money and put it back in your pocket or make a loan to another group.

Thanks for helping support Turame Community Finance in providing loans to those living in one of the poorest countries on the planet. 
You can learn more about Turame here: www.kiva.org/partners/162

teams.name: Supporters of Azerbaijan
teams.loan_because: we care / can / should
teams.description:

Some sample sites:

 * http://www.pbase.com/mcbit/azerbaijan
 * http://www.hansrossel.com/photos/azerbaijan/
* http://www.world66.com/europe/azerbaijan/
*http://www.eurasianet.org/
    THE source for up-to-date news of Central Asia...economic, political, cultural....will help you make sense of this complex part of the world.

teams.name: T4G
teams.loan_because: We believe we can help change the world.
teams.description:
T4G is built on a solid foundation employing great people who are creative, dedicated and passionate about what they do.

Over the next five years we will be investing in the things that matter to us. These topics include:

Organization - What will the organization of the future look like?
Sustainability - How can we do more with less?
Technology - How quickly can the rules of the game change?
Innovation - Can we do it better, faster and with more impact?
Social Responsibility - How can we accomplish more good?

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: EffortforOthers
teams.loan_because:
We see micro lending as a vehicle to change the world. We believe in a giving-model that is empowering, respectful and deliberate. We are sure the outcome of such action will have a significantly powerful impact on social, economic and environmental realities.

We recognise that the opportunity we enjoy in Australia isn't something we're entitled to, and we want to share our good fortune with others. 

We loan because it makes us feel good knowing we're making a positive social difference around the world.

We loan because it's an opportunity to start a conversation with our children, friends, co-workers, strangers on the bus and inspire them to the possibilities of what is possible feel how good it is to give.
teams.description:
Our team is YOU! 

We are regular people, doing regular things, but with one special characteristic, we believe in social kindness and the positive power of each other. Through daily association with each other and the projects we believe in, we are an ongoing source and consequence of kindness, inspiration, energy and connection.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***

http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

teams.name: EffortforOthers
teams.loan_because:
We see micro lending as a vehicle to change the world. We believe in a giving-model that is empowering, respectful and deliberate. We are sure the outcome of such action will have a significantly powerful impact on social, economic and environmental realities.

We recognise that the opportunity we enjoy in Australia isn't something we're entitled to, and we want to share our good fortune with others. 

We loan because it makes us feel good knowing we're making a positive social difference around the world.

We loan because it's an opportunity to start a conversation with our children, friends, co-workers, strangers on the bus and inspire them to the possibilities of what is possible feel how good it is to give.
teams.description:
Our team is YOU! 

We are regular people, doing regular things, but with one special characteristic, we believe in social kindness and the positive power of each other. Through daily association with each other and the projects we believe in, we are an ongoing source and consequence of kindness, inspiration, energy and connection.

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: Kiva Baha'is
teams.loan_because: Baha'u'llah told us to "Be generous in prosperity, and thankful in adversity. Be worthy of the trust of thy neighbor, and look upon him with a bright and friendly face. Be a treasure to the poor, an admonisher to the rich, an answerer to the cry of the needy, a preserver of the sanctity of thy pledge."

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Humanist
teams.loan_because: It takes people to help people.  We believe in good.
teams.description:
Humanists strive to live good and ethical lives, with no belief in the supernatural.  We give meaning and purpose to our lives through reason, compassion and action.

Most Atheists and non-religious people ARE Humanists, but don't realize it!

Our team helps the poor, builds the Humanist community and shows that non-religious people give, care and share.

We are endorsed by the American Humanist Association, British Humanist Association and International Humanist and Ethical Union.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: HALF THE SKY: Empowering Women
teams.loan_because: we believe empowering women is the key to alleviating social injustice and achieving world stability.
teams.description:
Inspired by the book HALF THE SKY written by Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn, our team is committed to helping curb culturally accepted abuse of women around the world.

Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/HALFTHESKYEmpoweringWomenKIVATeam

teams.name: TLM West Timor
teams.loan_because: We loan to empower poor entrepreneurs within NTT via  the economic, social, and spiritual transformation of their lives.
teams.description:
TLM is microfinance cooperative that seeks to improve the quality of life for poor communities in the province of NTT, Indonesia.  At the end of December 2010 TLM had approximately 21,463 clients and averaged 118% operational sustainability throughout 2010.

TLM is currently a Pilot MFI with Kiva and is working through their transition from Pilot to Active.

teams.name: The American International School of Jeddah
teams.description: The young economists of Jeddah, KSA

teams.name: Rochester Early College International High School
Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.description: HubSpot helps businesses transform the way they communicate and connect with their customers and prospects.

teams.name: The Joe Bell Group
teams.loan_because: we honor the memory of Joe and Carol Bell who modeled acceptance and concern for others.
teams.description: Our group formed 50 years ago for an MYF Travel Seminar.  We visited 8 European countries in 6 weeks with our beloved "adult advisors", Joe and Carol Bell.  We were youth delegates to the World Methodist Conference in Oslo, Norway in 1961.  Our lives blended through this shared experience.

teams.name: Turkey
teams.description: For Turkish Kiva users!

teams.name: Tollefson Pirates of the Saskatchewan
teams.loan_because: We loan because of wanting to do something about the unequal distribution of wealth and resources in our world.  Loaning to entrepreneurs is an effective way of helping people and developing local economies. We are pleased to be able to do that. Because of Terry Tollefson's interests we suggest loans supporting farming and education, although we welcome all loans.
teams.description: Our team honours the  memory of Professor Terry Tollefson who taught Soil Science in the College of Agriculture and Bioresources at the University of Saskatchewan.  Terry was an excellent teacher, a dear colleague, friend, and dedicated family man.  He was a successful farmer who applied what he taught to conservation farming in the semi-arid  prairies of Saskatchewan.  Many students from Saskatchewan and from distant lands became his good friends, experiencing Terry's consistent support  and interest in their life's journey.

teams.description:
We are a dissimilar group of like minded individuals who used to share an obsession, but now just annoy each other.

Welcome back!!!

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds
